originalText.text: Nancy is a true gem! Not only is she kind and personable, she has great expertise organizing! As she helped me sort through things and organize, she gave me inspiration and motivation! I appreciated how she kept on top of every detail. What felt so overwhelming to me seemed like nothing to her. Wow - Thanks Nancy!

I appreciated how she kept on top of every detail. What felt so overwhelming to me seemed like nothing to her. Wow - Thanks Nancy!

originalText.text: From a state of overwhelm to one of calm and ease, this was my experience of work with Nancy. Nancy’s professionalism ingenuity, relatedness, and ability to accomplish so much in such little time made both organizing and decluttering with her a gift.

text.text: From a state of overwhelm to one of calm and ease, this was my experience of work with Nancy. Nancy’s professionalism ingenuity, relatedness, and ability to accomplish so much in such little time made both organizing and decluttering with her a gift.

originalText.text:
Nancy is incredibly talented, especially when it comes to organizing.
Before Nancy, I was completely paralyzed by my clutter for YEARS.  She came over to my apartment armed with compassion, expertise, and a full bag of tricks that finally got me moving in the right direction.
If your physical clutter has an emotional component, I highly recommend working with Nancy and Goodbye Clutter.  She really gets it.

originalText.text: Nancy Heller is simply a delight to work with.  She has amazing vision and taste, is both professional and a joy to work with and truly cares about her clients in a way I have not experienced before.  Nancy has an incredibly positive attitude and energy which inspires you to both de-clutter as well as create a new, wonderful home.  She also makes what could be a dreaded task a fun collaboration.  I enjoy every minute I work with Nancy!  From the moment she walks in the door, she determines what needs to be done and always makes sure that the client is comfortable with her recommendations.  If not, she works around her client's ideas, whether or not she totally agrees with them.  This makes it so comfortable working with Nancy because she takes the time to understand her client and figure out how to make the client happy with the end result.  I've worked with another expert in de-cluttering, but there is simply no comparison between my experience with the first one and Nancy.  Nancy takes joy in seeing her client's happiness in the work that she has done with you.  I look forward to working with Nancy a few more times to complete my new home!

originalText.text: We  had the good fortune of finding Nancy as we prepared our apartment for sale.  The thought of going through 30 years of “stuff” was overwhelming.  Nancy came in, developed a plan with our input and got to work.  We sorted everything, put some stuff into storage, discarded some stuff and organized the remainder.  Nancy exuded so much energy that it was contagious.  Nancy got us through the project with humor, caring and purpose.  We could not have been ready to sell the apartment without Nancy’s help.  She is fantastic!
